name: Fae Of The Forest
description:
Evil descends upon the forest. Defend it with the very elements you were created to protect! Collect resources within the forest and use the Cauldron to craft powerful magics to repel the maleficent incursion in this 2D spell-em-up. 

University project created in Spring 2020 within Clickteam Fusion, as part of a group of four. You must create a potion to save the forest whilst combining ingredients to throw at enemies.
